descriptions.help:
Usage: help
Sends a list of all commands
descriptions.echo:
Usage: echo <message to echo>
Repeats what you write
descriptions.serverinfo:
Usage: serverinfo
Displays server connection info along with the status and dynmap
descriptions.count:
Usage: count
Gets current member count
descriptions.yesorno:
Usage: yesorno
Sends random: yes or no
descriptions.report:
Usage: report <message to send to staff>
Sends a message to the staff team
descriptions.guildicon:
Usage: guildicon
Sends the icon for the server
descriptions.ping:
Usage: ping
Gets bot api latency
descriptions.suggest:
Usage: suggest <suggestion>
Sends a suggestion to the suggestion channel
descriptions.thiscommandliterallydoesnothing:
Usage: thiscommandliterallydoesnothing
Do I really need to explain?
descriptions.mcping:
Usage: mcping <optional server ip>
Pings a minecraft server
descriptions.slowmode:
Usage: slowmode <slowmode time in seconds>
Sets the channel slowmode to specified seconds
descriptions.play:
Usage: play <youtube url>
Plays a youtube url in your voice chat
descriptions.join:
Usage: join
Joins your voice chat
descriptions.leave:
Usage: leave
Leaves your voice chat
descriptions.fact:
Usage: fact
Gets a random fact
descriptions.meme:
Usage: meme
Gets a random meme from r/dankmemes
descriptions.randomreddit:
Usage: randomreddit <subreddit name>
Gets a random post from the specified subreddit
descriptions.insult:
Usage: insuly
Gets a random insult
descriptions.yomama:
Usage: yomama
Gets a random yo mama joke
descriptions.joke:
Usage: joke
Gets a random joke
descriptions.google:
Usage: google <search term to google>
Googles stuff for you
descriptions.thiscommandmightdosomething:
Usage: thiscommandmightdosomething
May or may not do something.
descriptions.paradox:
Usage: paradox
Gives you a paradox

list.general: help | echo | delete | serverinfo | count | yesorno | report | guildicon | ping | suggest | mcping
list.fun: fact | meme | randomreddit | insult | yomama | joke | google | thiscommandliterallydoesnothing | thiscommandmightdosomething | paradox
